title: Suggestion for Champion mastery tokens
body:
So i have a suggestion that will make a few players happy:
Alot of people get mastery tokens for champions they are not interested in upgrading to mastery 6 or 7, eg i have olaf, xin zhao and mastery yi mastery 6 tokens and will not upgrade them because i dont play these champions anymore.
My suggestion is add a way to redem these tokens for champion essence, from all of the unwanted tokens into something that they want, "you may say, but can't you just farm champion essence from getting s ranks?" maybe they could make it only a certain amount of tokens are redem-able.

replies.body: ^ Any extra option other then the current pay to win is a positive imo. Too much greed, especially considering the multi billion dollar company it already is but that's enough =-\.
